bitfield.description: Module ID
RTL version
Major version
Custom version
Minor version
Status to indicate if read on serial VBUS is complete
Read address
Write 1 to trigger a read on the serial VBUS
Value written to select the corresponding ECC RAM for control or status
Indicates the number of RAMS serviced by the ECC aggregator
Module ID
RTL version
Major version
Custom version
Minor version
check for svbus timeout errors
check for parity errors
Force Error only once
Force Error on any RAM read
Force Double Bit Error
Force Single Bit Error
Enable rmw
Enable ECC check
Enable ECC
Row address where single or double-bit error needs to be applied. This is ignored if force_n_row is set
Data bit that needs to be flipped if double bit error needs to be forced
Data bit that needs to be flipped when force_sec is set
Data bit that corresponds to the single-bit error
Clear control reg error Error Status, you must also re write the contorl ergister itself to clear this
Clear parity Error Status
Clear other Error Status
Clear Double Bit Error Status
Clear Single Bit Error Status
control register error pending, Level interrupt
Level parity error Error Status
successive single-bit errors have occurred while a writeback is still pending, Level interrupt
Level Double Bit Error Status
Level Single Bit Error Status
Row address where the single or double-bit error has occurred

Level svbus timeout error Error Status
delayed write back pending Status
